ace-research-validation.description: Tests validating compliance with ACE research paper (arXiv:2510.04618) architecture
patterns: Test for no hardcoded PATTERNS array
Test for Generator -> Reflector -> Curator architecture
Test for graceful degradation on Reflector failure
Test for iterative refinement (max 5 rounds, <5% improvement stops)

sqlite-test-validation.description: SQLite database testing patterns for ACE pattern storage
patterns: Direct SQL queries to validate data integrity

compliance-testing.description: Tests that validate implementation matches specification or research paper

critical-test-annotation.description: Using comments and docstrings to mark tests that validate core architecture

fail-fast-with-context.description: Assert statements with detailed error messages explaining WHY failure matters

research-paper-traceability.description: Linking code tests directly to research paper requirements with explicit citations

architectural-guard-tests.description: Tests that prevent accidental violation of core design decisions

metadata.discovery_method: bottom-up from file paths and descriptions
